title: Andy Karl: 'Groundhog Day' Seven Days A Week
description: Tony Nominee Andy Karl from Broadway's Groundhog Day shares what makes the script irresistible and his thoughts on movies turned musicals. Plus a game about weather forecasters who became celebrities.
